2014-03-02-animation-appreciation-stormj.title: Animation Appreciation: StormJumper
2014-03-02-animation-appreciation-stormj.author: admin
2014-03-02-animation-appreciation-stormj.__content: *As a planetary storm approaches, a lone shaman manages to avoid disaster.* That's the description of this incredible short film, animated by Malcolm Sutherland. It's called ‘StormJumper'. You need to watch it. (Click here to view on Vimeo)
